title: Where is Cosmic Blade Master Yi?
body: Wasn't he supposed to be released with the the 2 new champions and their Cosmic skins?

replies.body: If u don't plan to release a skin within the first week of the patch update then don't put it in the patch. Am fed up with waiting I wanna connect the Cosmos get my Pentas and look fancy I can wait another day {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Cosmic Master Yi hasn't been added quite yet. Keep an eye on our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) and you'll know the moment he gets added!
Is there any reason why it hasn't been released? Some players were saying that they were changing the graphic details on alpha strike.
New skins are usually spread out through a patch cycle so I would except the new Master Yi skin to show up soon.
